This is the list of mirrors that hosts Wikiteam's backups.

== List of mirrors ==
 # Master server ([http://code.google.com/p/wikiteam/downloads/list Google Code] and [http://mirrors.sdboyd56.com/WikiTeam/ ScottDB wikibackups site])
 # [https://sourceforge.net/projects/wikiteam/files/ Sourceforge] (which is also mirrored to another 26 mirrors)

== How to join ==
If you are interested in hosting a mirror of Wikiteam's backups, follow one of the following methods of downloading our files:
 # Download all the files from both this website and [http://mirrors.sdboyd56.com/WikiTeam/ ScottDB wikibackups site].
 # If you have wget installed on your server, use the following command:
 {{{
 wget -r --no-parent http://netcologne.dl.sourceforge.net/project/wikiteam/ wikiteam
 }}}

Send us the link to your mirror so that we could add it to this list. Thank you for your participation!
